document_data.caption: ''A species of northern haddock.''
document_data.name: Haddock
document_data.mainbody:
'''Haddock''' was a species of edible saltwater [[fish]] that was often confused with a cheaper fish â€“ [[walleye pollock]].

{{quote|''Too Much [[Haddock]]? Make Fish Cakes!''|A headline from ''[[Baldur's Mouth]] Gazetteer''}}

===Varieties===
*'''Northern haddock''': a subspecies of haddock found in the far northern [[Sea of Moving Ice]], commonly fished by the villages and towns in [[Icewind Dale]] and [[Frozenfar]]. Northern haddock was an important export out of the region, traditionally smoked, but also battered and fried in the [[Ten-Towns]], as an imitation of southern dishes.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the ''[[Baldur's Mouth]] Gazette'' published an article on the excess of haddock catch and recommended it to be cooked into [[fishcake]]s.
